snippet.title: Restless Nights Official Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Official Gameplay Trailer for my next game titled "Restless Nights" Releasing July 25th, 2024.

Music by Joe Hertz - HZ Audio 

This game was inspired by games like FNAF, I'm on Observation Duty and Try to Fall Asleep. It is packed with dark secrets and mysteries to be unlocked. Can you find them.

Wishlist the game here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2668770/Restless_Nights/
